body_html:
For the training and testing, you can run your program twice. First time training + checkpoint the model. Second time load up the checkpoint and do the inference on the testing data to get accuracy.

I believe the issues you faced is not related to the bug inside tensorflow. So stackoverflow should be a better place for your problem.
body_text:
For the training and testing, you can run your program twice. First time training + checkpoint the model. Second time load up the checkpoint and do the inference on the testing data to get accuracy.
I believe the issues you faced is not related to the bug inside tensorflow. So stackoverflow should be a better place for your problem.
body:
For the training and testing, you can run your program twice. First time training + checkpoint the model. Second time load up the checkpoint and do the inference on the testing data to get accuracy.

I believe the issues you faced is not related to the bug inside tensorflow. So stackoverflow should be a better place for your problem.
